content: Proceedings: After a careful reviewing process, all accepted papers after proper registration and presentation, papers will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM, which will be archived in the ACM Digital Library, and will be indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science).
